text: Christina Lindberg, born 4 November 1968, is a Swedish country and dansband singer. She has sung together with Lasse Stefanz, and is probably most known for the song "De sista ljuva Ã¥ren", which was a Svensktoppen hit from February 1989 and the upcoming 65 weeks, until the song left the chart in September 1990. == References == == Otheer websites == *Christina Lindbergs homepage Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers
